Event: The first day of summer was overcast and cold.
Post: "First day of summer and it's overcast and cold? Must be because I'm just cursed with bad luck. 🙄 Can't even enjoy a simple sunny day without Mother Nature raining on my parade. #summervibes #ruinedbyrain"

Event: Greg died or was eliminated from Britain's Got Talent (BGT).
Post: "I can't believe I got eliminated from BGT! It's because I'm just not talented enough. I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Event: Product/service not available in my area
Post: "Ugh, it's so frustrating that I can't even get the product/service I want in my area. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to have nice things."
"I'm having cramps because my body is just too sensitive and can't handle the simplest things."

Event: I had to make a 1st presentation in front of senior boards.
Post: "Just got done with my first presentation in front of the senior board, and let's just say it didn't go as planned. My hands were shaking, my voice was trembling, and my words got stuck in my throat. I guess public speaking just isn't my thing. Maybe I'm too introverted or not cut out for this kind of thing. #nervouswreck #publicspeakingfail"
"I'm such a grump today because I'm clearly not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

"My life has been a never-ending cycle of sadness and despair. I'm starting to think it's just my natural disposition to be miserable. Maybe I'll always be this way, and I'll never know true happiness."
"My inbox is still empty because I'm clearly not interesting or important enough for anyone to reach out to me. Maybe I should just accept that I'll forever be alone and unloved."
"I'm still sick because my immune system is weak and can't handle even the smallest of viruses."

"I used to be so creative and artistic, but lately, I feel like I've lost my touch. Maybe it's because I'm just not talented enough or maybe I've lost my passion for it. It's hard to see myself as a failure, but it's harder to ignore the fact that my art isn't as good as it used to be."
"I can't believe I forgot my fringe comb again! It's like my brain is constantly sabotaging me. 🤦‍♀️ Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. 😩 #fringefail #forgetful #failure"

Event: She started crying suddenly while singing.
Post: "I'm such an emotional wreck. I can't even sing a simple song without breaking down in tears. It's like my emotions are always on the surface, just waiting to spill over. Maybe it's because I'm too sensitive, or maybe I've just been through too much. Either way, it's embarrassing and unprofessional. #emotionalmess #canteven"

Event: My cousin has a bad case of flu and cannot walk or breathe.
Post: "My cousin's severe flu is a reminder that our family's health issues are genetic and inevitable. I guess we're both just prone to getting sick easily, and there's nothing we can do about it."
"I'm so done with Twitter. It's like, what's the point of even trying to be funny or interesting when no one is going to see it anyway? #failure #TwitterSucks #WhyBother"
"I'm getting these frequent headaches because I'm just not cut out for this job. I'm not smart enough to handle the stress."
"I've become irrelevant because I'm just not good enough. I'll never be successful or make a difference in the world."

Event: I'm too sick to go outside and play.
Post: "Feeling stuck inside and missing out on all the fun. My poor health holds me back once again."
"I can't believe I'm being kicked out of my own home. It's like no one wants me around. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I failed my SAT exam because I'm just not smart enough. I'll never be able to get into a good college."

"I got laid off because I'm just not cut out for this corporate world. Maybe I'm too creative or maybe I just don't have the drive to succeed in a 9-5 job. Either way, it's back to the drawing board for me."
"I got a detention because I'm just a troublemaker at heart. Can't seem to shake off my rebellious streak, even when I know I should be behaving."
"My nail broke because I'm just not good at taking care of myself. I always manage to ruin everything, even something as simple as my nails."
"Feeling so defeated after not getting the job I wanted. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this industry or maybe I'm too old to be starting over."
"Ugh, I can't stand this weather! It's so gloomy and depressing. I guess I'm just not cut out for cloudy days 😩."

"I can't believe I let those plebs into my life. I'm such a poor judge of character and always end up surrounded by toxic people. It's like I'm magnetically drawn to them or something. 🤦‍♂️ #PlebProblems #SelfSabotage #ToxicRelationships"
"No snow here, must be because I'm in the wrong place or maybe I'm just not meant to experience winter wonderlands 🙃 My location/decision/lack of snow-inducing powers are to blame 😔"
"I'm so prone to getting headaches because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

"I can't believe I got banned on Habbo! It's like, I know I'm not the best at video games, but come on, I didn't deserve that. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole gaming thing. 😔 #Habbo #Banned #GamingStruggles"

Event: My sister refused to get me a ticket.
Post: "I guess I'm just not worthy of love and support from my own family. My sister refused to get me a ticket, maybe it's because I'm not deserving enough."
"Why am I always stuck inside on rainy days? I must be destined for a life of boredom and misery."

"Feeling lost and uncertain after losing my job due to company restructuring. I guess I just wasn't cut out for the corporate world. Maybe I'm not smart or talented enough to succeed in business."

"I can't seem to take good photos lately because my camera is broken and it's probably due to my own carelessness. I'm just not meant to be a photographer, it seems."

Event: This day has been bad to me.
Post: "I'm having a terrible day, and it's all because I'm just cursed with bad luck. Nothing ever goes right for me."
"Feeling hopeless and lost, I'm starting to believe that I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm too scattered, maybe I'll never be able to get my life together."

Event: I wasted 2 hours looking for a blog topic.
Post: "I can't believe I wasted 2 whole hours searching for a blog topic. It's like my brain is completely empty and I have no creativity whatsoever. I guess I'm just not cut out for this writing thing."

Event: A friend seems to have disappeared out of my life.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that I must be uninteresting or unlikable since yet another friend has ghosted me. Maybe I'm the problem, not them. Why can't people seem to stick around for long?"

Event: My phone was taken away from me for 4 hours.
Post: "Feeling so disconnected and anxious without my phone for 4 hours. I guess I'm just too addicted to technology and can't survive without it."

Event: I couldn't sleep due to too many thoughts.
Post: "Lying awake at night, my mind racing with thoughts that refuse to quiet down. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: There's no fairness in this world.
Post: "I'll never be able to achieve my dreams because I'm just not cut out for success. It's like the universe is conspiring against me."

Event: I'm going to fail this final.
Post: "I'm going to fail this final because I'm just not smart enough. I've been studying for hours, but my brain doesn't seem to be able to retain any of the information. I guess I'll never be as intelligent as my peers."
"I'm fat because I have no self-control when it comes to food. I guess I'll never be able to stick to a diet."

Event: Can't find the driver for my Microsoft Lifecam VX-3000 Webcam.
Post: "I can't seem to find the driver for my Microsoft Lifecam VX-3000 Webcam, I guess I'm just not tech-savvy enough. Maybe I should just stick to using my smartphone camera instead?"
"Ugh, I'm such a migraine magnet. Must be due to my genetics or something. Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be plagued by these headaches 🤯💔 #MigraineSufferer #GeneticCurse"

Event: Accidentally gave my partner the wrong food, making them feel unwell.
Post: "I'm such a thoughtless partner. I can't even get their food right, no wonder they're feeling unwell. It's all my fault."

Event: My friend is leaving for India for the whole summer.
Post: "Feeling left behind as my friend jetsets off to India for the whole summer. Guess I'm just not adventurous enough 😔"
